ygData.subject: Re: Post awhile back on Crafted Locations
ygData.msgSnippet: dark circlet is off trazdon in najena near the bonecracker room.
ygData.messageBody:
dark circlet is off trazdon in najena near the bonecracker room.

On Thu, 2 Sep 1999, dlobdell wrote:

> From: "dlobdell" <dlobdell@...>
>
> Are these absolutly confirmed? Cause i was told the circlet required for the greaves was found on a necro in najena named +ACI-Tarzon+ACI- Or Tazran+ACI- something of that natrue.. not Drelzna who ive fought many times and never recieved the circlet..
>
> Wes Lobdell,
> Note: I'm not a Mac person, but you have to admit, the following is funny+ACEAIQ- :) And if you don't +ACI-get+ACI- it, then I guess the media hasn't soaked it for all its worth yet after all...
> Quote: +ACI-Macintosh -- we might not get everything right, but
> atleast we knew the century was going to end.+ACI-
>
> ------------------------
> My all time favorite Oxymorons:
> exact estimate, plastic silverware, genuine imitation, mud bath, original copy, student teacher, alone together, anarchy rules, bitter sweet, bankrupt millionaire, black light, butt-head, casual sex, clean dirt, coed sorority, cold as hell, computer jock, constant change, cowardly lion, curved line(according to the mathematical definition of a line), delibrate mistake, dry wine, earth angel(ok thats just going back a ways +ADs-), educational television, even odds, found missing, freezer burn, fresh cheese, full-length bikini, half full, half naked, hard water, hells angels, idiot savant, jumbo shrimp, less is more, and finally my all time
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Jason Harrell jharrell+AEA-planetalumni.com
> To: EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com
> Date: Wednesday, September 01, 1999 4:55 PM
> Subject: RE: +AFs-EQCheats+AF0- Post awhile back on Crafted Locations
>
>
> From: +ACI-Jason Harrell+ACI- jharrell+AEA-planetalumni.com
>
> Here's the repost +AD0-)
>
> 1. See below, otherwise hail the named cents and follow the prompts.
> 2. No, anyone can do the quest.
> 3. The Star Rubies, Fire Emeralds, Rubies, and Sapphires can be bought in a
> number of places that sell the jewelling metals (Qeynos and Freeport
> verified). The other components are dropped items.
> 4. WAR only items, all races though. Check sites like EQ'Lizer for the
> actual stats on them.
>
> Gauntlets: Aviak Charm (Aviak Avocets, South Karana), and 2 Star Rubies
> Boots: Frost Totem (Ice Goblin High Shamans, Permafrost), 2 Star Rubies
> Helm: Fire Totem (Fire Goblin High Clerics, Solusek), 2 Rubies
> Vambrace: Eye of a Griffon (East Commonlands, North Karana, etc.), 2 Fire
> Emeralds
> Bracer: Evil Eye Optic Nerve (rare drop item like the Polished Bone Bracer),
> a Sapphire
> Greaves: Silver Circlet (Necromancer in Najena, Drelzna), 2 Star Rubies
> Pauldrones: the Three Parts of the Rune of Dwarves (Evil Eyes, Runnyeye),
> Fire Emerald
> Breastplate: Werewolf Talons (Mistmoore, Mayong Tribe), 3 Rubies
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Whitcraft,David +AFs-mailto:DWHITCRAFT+AEA-cerner.com+AF0-
> Sent: Wednesday, September 01, 1999 3:52 PM
> To: 'EQ-Spoilers+AEA-onelist.com'+ADs- 'EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com'
> Subject: +AFs-EQCheats+AF0- Post awhile back on Crafted Locations
>
>
> From: +ACI-Whitcraft,David+ACI- DWHITCRAFT+AEA-cerner.com
>
> There was an excellent post either earlier this week or end of laat week on
> locations on all of the items required for the crafted pieces (or many of
> them). If anyone still has this list, could you either re-post it or email
> it to me?
>
> If not, can we fill the list back out again?
>
>
